name: Realistic
description: Natural, lifelike cinematography that mimics how the human eye sees the world. Emphasizes authenticity and believability.

technicalElements.cameraMovement: Smooth, natural movements that follow action organically. Handheld for intimacy, tripod for stability
technicalElements.framingApproach: Standard framing rules, eye-level shots, natural perspectives that feel comfortable and familiar
technicalElements.lensChoices: Standard focal lengths (35-85mm), minimal distortion, natural depth of field
technicalElements.colorGrading: Natural color correction that enhances without calling attention to itself

visualCharacteristics.lightingStyle: Natural lighting sources, soft shadows, realistic contrast ratios
visualCharacteristics.depthOfField: Natural depth of field that guides attention without being distracting
visualCharacteristics.visualTexture: Clean, natural texture that emphasizes the reality of the world

productionConsiderations.equipmentNeeds: Standard camera equipment, natural lighting setups, minimal special equipment
productionConsiderations.skillRequirements: Solid fundamentals in cinematography, understanding of natural lighting

examples.title: Manchester by the Sea
examples.description: Natural, unobtrusive cinematography that serves the emotional story

examples.title: The Social Network
examples.description: Clean, realistic visual style that focuses on character and dialogue

name: Stylized
description: Deliberately artificial cinematography that creates a specific visual aesthetic, often emphasizing mood and atmosphere over realism.

technicalElements.cameraMovement: Deliberate, choreographed movements that serve the visual style. May include unusual angles or movements
technicalElements.framingApproach: Creative framing that may break traditional rules for artistic effect
technicalElements.lensChoices: Wide variety of focal lengths used creatively, may include distortion for effect
technicalElements.colorGrading: Strong color grading that creates specific moods and visual signatures

visualCharacteristics.lightingStyle: Dramatic, artificial lighting that creates specific moods and visual effects
visualCharacteristics.depthOfField: Creative use of depth of field for artistic and narrative purposes
visualCharacteristics.visualTexture: Enhanced visual texture that may be heightened or artificial

productionConsiderations.equipmentNeeds: Specialized lighting equipment, creative camera rigs, post-production tools
productionConsiderations.skillRequirements: Advanced cinematography skills, artistic vision, post-production expertise

examples.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
examples.description: Highly stylized visual approach with symmetrical framing and distinctive color palette

examples.title: Blade Runner 2049
examples.description: Stylized sci-fi cinematography with dramatic lighting and color

name: Documentary
description: Observational cinematography that captures reality as it unfolds, emphasizing authenticity and immediacy over polished aesthetics.

technicalElements.cameraMovement: Handheld, reactive camera work that follows action as it happens
technicalElements.framingApproach: Practical framing that captures events as they occur, may be imperfect but authentic
technicalElements.lensChoices: Versatile zoom lenses, standard focal lengths for flexibility
technicalElements.colorGrading: Minimal color correction to maintain natural, authentic look

visualCharacteristics.lightingStyle: Available light, minimal artificial lighting, natural shadows and contrast
visualCharacteristics.depthOfField: Natural depth of field, focus follows action organically
visualCharacteristics.visualTexture: Raw, unpolished texture that emphasizes authenticity

productionConsiderations.equipmentNeeds: Portable camera equipment, minimal lighting, audio recording equipment
productionConsiderations.skillRequirements: Observational skills, ability to work quickly and adapt to situations

examples.title: Free Solo
examples.description: Documentary cinematography that captures real events with immediacy and authenticity

examples.title: Won't You Be My Neighbor?
examples.description: Intimate documentary style that feels personal and authentic

name: Experimental
description: Avant-garde cinematography that pushes boundaries and explores new visual languages, often prioritizing artistic expression over conventional storytelling.

technicalElements.cameraMovement: Unconventional camera movements, may include abstract or non-narrative motion
technicalElements.framingApproach: Breaks traditional framing rules, may use unusual angles or perspectives
technicalElements.lensChoices: Creative use of lenses including extreme wide-angle, macro, or modified optics
technicalElements.colorGrading: Extreme or artistic color manipulation that serves the experimental vision

visualCharacteristics.lightingStyle: Creative, artistic lighting that may be abstract or non-naturalistic
visualCharacteristics.depthOfField: Experimental use of focus for artistic rather than narrative purposes
visualCharacteristics.visualTexture: May include multiple exposures, digital effects, or unconventional techniques

productionConsiderations.equipmentNeeds: May require specialized or modified equipment, experimental techniques
productionConsiderations.skillRequirements: Advanced technical skills, artistic vision, willingness to experiment

examples.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
examples.description: Groundbreaking experimental cinematography that created new visual languages

examples.title: Enter the Void
examples.description: Highly experimental visual approach with unique perspectives and techniques

name: Vintage
description: Cinematography that emulates the look and feel of earlier film eras, using period-appropriate techniques and aesthetics.

technicalElements.cameraMovement: Period-appropriate camera movements, may be more static or formal
technicalElements.framingApproach: Classical framing techniques from specific film eras
technicalElements.lensChoices: Vintage lenses or modern lenses that emulate vintage characteristics
technicalElements.colorGrading: Period-appropriate color timing, may include film grain or vintage processing

visualCharacteristics.lightingStyle: Classical Hollywood lighting or period-specific lighting techniques
visualCharacteristics.depthOfField: Depth of field characteristics of vintage lenses and film stocks
visualCharacteristics.visualTexture: Film grain, vintage color characteristics, period-appropriate visual texture

productionConsiderations.equipmentNeeds: Vintage lenses, period-appropriate equipment, specialized post-production
productionConsiderations.skillRequirements: Knowledge of film history, classical cinematography techniques

examples.title: The Artist
examples.description: Authentic recreation of silent film era cinematography

name: Modern
description: Contemporary cinematography that utilizes current technology and techniques to create clean, polished, and technically sophisticated visuals.

technicalElements.cameraMovement: Smooth, precise camera movements using modern stabilization technology
technicalElements.framingApproach: Contemporary framing that may blend traditional and innovative approaches
technicalElements.lensChoices: High-quality modern lenses with excellent optical characteristics
technicalElements.colorGrading: Sophisticated digital color grading with precise control and modern aesthetics

visualCharacteristics.lightingStyle: Clean, controlled lighting using modern LED and digital techniques
visualCharacteristics.depthOfField: Precise control of depth of field for both aesthetic and narrative purposes
visualCharacteristics.visualTexture: Clean, high-resolution imagery with excellent technical quality

productionConsiderations.equipmentNeeds: Modern digital cameras, LED lighting, stabilization equipment
productionConsiderations.skillRequirements: Current technical knowledge, digital workflow expertise

examples.title: La La Land
examples.description: Modern cinematography with classical influences and contemporary polish

examples.title: Her
examples.description: Clean, modern visual style that feels contemporary and sophisticated
